info.name: TSDM
info.description: This collection contains all the RESTful API endpoints to _CRUD_ data to the **TSDM** engine:

item.name: Project
/project/
item.description: The default endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information:

item.name: /project/id/<id>
item.description: The endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information if you know the tsdm_id:

item.name: /project/id/<id>/testsuite
item.description: The endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information if you know the tsdm_id:

item.name: /project/almid/<alm_id>
Update a Project by ALM Id
Delete a Project by ALM Id Copy

item.description: The endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information if you know the alm_id:

item.name: /project/name/<name>
item.description: The endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information if you know the name:
The RESTful API endpoints for **projects**:

item.name: Testsuite (Epic)
Add a Testsuite with Project ID
Add a Testsuite with Project Name
Add a Testsuite with Project ALM ID
Update a Testsuite by ALM Id
Delete a Testsuite by ALM Id Copy

item.description: The RESTful API endpoints for **testsuites (epics)**:

item.name: Workflow (Feature)
Add a Workflow with Testsuite ID
Add a Workflow with Testsuite Name
Add a Workflow with Testsuite ALM ID
Update a Workflow by ALM Id
Delete a Workflow by ALM Id Copy

item.description: The RESTful API endpoints for **workflow (feature)**:

item.name: Scenario (User Story)
Add a Scenario with Workflow Id
Add a Scenario with Workflow Name
Add a Scenario with Workflow ALM ID
Update a Scenario by ALM Id
Delete a Scenarion by ALM Id Copy

item.description: The RESTful API endpoints for **workflow (feature)**:

item.name: Transaction (Acceptance Criteria)
Add a Transaction with Scenario ID
Add a Transaction with Scenario Name
Add a Transaction with Scenario ALM ID
Update a Transaction by ALM Id
Delete a Transaction by ALM Id Copy

item.description: The RESTful API endpoints for **workflow (feature)**:

item.name: Gherkin Step
Add a Gherkin Step with Transaction ID
Add a Gherkin Step with Transaction Name
Add a Gherkin Step with Transaction ALM ID
Update a Gherkin Step by Id
Delete a Gherkin Step by Id

item.description: The RESTful API endpoints for **workflow (feature)**:

item.name: /stepaction/<id>
item.description: The endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information if you know the tsdm_id:

item.name: Add new action and link to stepaction
/action/<id>
item.description: The endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information if you know the tsdm_id:

item.name: Environment
/environment/
item.description: The default endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information:

item.name: /environment/<id>
item.description: The endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information if you know the tsdm_id:

item.name: Add an Environment by Project ALM ID

item.description: The RESTful API endpoints for **projects**:

item.name: /tokenname/<id>
Get a Token Name by Id
Update a Token Name by Id
Delete a Token Name by Id

item.description: The endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information if you know the tsdm_id:

item.name: Data Iteration
/dataiteration/
item.description: The default endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information:

item.name: /dataiteration/<id>
item.description: The endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information if you know the tsdm_id:

item.name: Get all Dataiterations for a StepAction

item.description: The RESTful API endpoints for **projects**:

item.name: Key Value Pair
/keyvaluepair/
item.description: The default endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information:

item.name: /keyvaluepair/<id>
item.description: The endpoint to CRUD **projects** to the **TSDM** engine with minimum information if you know the tsdm_id:
The RESTful API endpoints for **projects**:

item.name: Get All Projects with all children
Add collection of Projects with all children

body.raw:
{
	"projects": [
		{
			"is_active": true,

										{
											"is_active": true,
